item.description:
Many of know and love local singer songwriter Gale B. Gardiner.  By Chance, Gale recently attended a wonderful benefit dinner held at Cugino's.  She kindly offered to donate a CD for the raffle, and the owner of the restaurant was impressed and ask her to come and play at the restaurant!  If all goes well, this can become a regular bi-monthly gig for Gale.  So - coming out will show your support to both restaurant and musician!

AND....you will LOVE this place...it has a cozy authentic European feel and amazing food.  The owner is warm and friendly and offers homemade Northern Italian/Croatian cuisine.  There is a full bar and lots of room to spread out amd use the time however you wish.  

  Gale will be playing dinner piano music from 6-8 p.m. This will be followed by a live Rock'n Roots show.   She writes :

Fri. Oct. 12th, 2012  

 Gale B. Gardiner  

Dinner Piano Music

6:00 pm-8:00 pm 

NO COVER with purchase of a meal between 6-8 p.m.

  Rock n’ Roots

 8:00 pm-11:00pm

   Highland St. (Route #10)
  Cheshire, CT

So come try it out...relax, eat, listen. 

For more about

Gale Gardiner:  http://www.cdbaby.com/Artist/GaleBGardiner

And

Cugino's:  http://cheshire.patch.com/listings/cuginos-italian-restaurant

 

 Fortune’s Gale with Danny Reilert

if just coming for the 8 - 11 show, there will be a donation jar...
item.name: A new COZY COOL Cheshire Venue...CUGINO's!
